application.name: ORACLE - Componente SGA - DB Cache Size

item.name: Servico Mysql - (Porta 3306 TCP) - Oracle Linux - (Verifica se a porta está escutando)
Servico Mysql - (Porta 3306 TCP) - Oracle Linux - (Possibilidade de fazer conexão nesta porta)
Contingencia - Teste dos valores de coleta

application.name: ORACLE - Componente SGA - DB Cache Size
ORACLE - Componente SGA - DB Cache Size

item.name: Tamanho Total Diretorio Backup do Dia - Storage
Verificacao Backup Arquivo Backup RMAN - Storage
Verificacao Arquivo de Log do Listener
Tempo do Backup do Export
item.key: system.run[ test -e /oracle/disco1/backup/logs/backup-export_`date "+%Y%m%d"`.log && cat /oracle/disco1/backup/logs/backup-export_`date "+%Y%m%d"`.log | sed -n '1p;$p' || echo "Arquivo nao gerado" ]

item.name: Tempo do Backup dos Programas
item.key: system.run[ test -e /oracle/disco1/backup/logs/backup-programas_`date "+%Y%m%d"`.log && cat /oracle/disco1/backup/logs/backup-programas_`date "+%Y%m%d"`.log | sed -n '1p;$p' || echo "Arquivo nao gerado" ]

item.name: Tempo do Backup do RMAN
item.key: system.run[ test -e /oracle/disco1/backup/logs/backup-rman_`date "+%Y%m%d"`.log && cat /oracle/disco1/backup/logs/backup-rman_`date "+%Y%m%d"`.log | sed -n '1p;$p' || echo "Arquivo nao gerado" ]

item.name: Tamanho Arquivo do Log do Listener
Tamanho Total ORACLE JAVA POOL
item.key: system.run[test `cat /etc/zabbix/oracle/COMPONENTES_SGA_f3ipro.txt | grep java | awk -F ';' {'print $2'} | wc -w` -eq 1 && cat /etc/zabbix/oracle/COMPONENTES_SGA_f3ipro.txt | grep java | awk -F ';' {'print $2'} || echo 0]

item.name: Tamanho Usado ORACLE JAVA POOL
item.key: system.run[test `cat /etc/zabbix/oracle/COMPONENTES_SGA_f3ipro.txt | grep java | awk -F ';' {'print $3'} | wc -w` -eq 1 && cat /etc/zabbix/oracle/COMPONENTES_SGA_f3ipro.txt | grep java | awk -F ';' {'print $3'} || echo 0]

item.name: Tamanho Total Stream
item.key: system.run[ test `cat /etc/zabbix/oracle/COMPONENTES_SGA_f3ipro.txt | grep stream | awk -F ';' {'print $2'} | wc -w` -eq 1 && cat /etc/zabbix/oracle/COMPONENTES_SGA_f3ipro.txt | grep stream | awk -F ';' {'print $2'} || echo 0 ]

item.name: Tamanho Usado Stream
item.key: system.run[ test `cat /etc/zabbix/oracle/COMPONENTES_SGA_f3ipro.txt | grep stream | awk -F ';' {'print $3'} | wc -w` -eq 1 && cat /etc/zabbix/oracle/COMPONENTES_SGA_f3ipro.txt | grep stream | awk -F ';' {'print $3'} || echo 0 ]

item.name: Tamanho Total DATAFILES - F3I_LOG 1
item.key: system.run[test `cat /etc/zabbix/oracle/DATAFILES_f3ipro.txt 2> /dev/null | grep F3I_LOG | sed '1!d' | wc -l` -eq 1 && cat /etc/zabbix/oracle/DATAFILES_f3ipro.txt | grep F3I_LOG | sed '1!d' | awk -F ';' {'print $2'} || echo 0 ]

item.name: Tamanho Usado - F3I_LOG 1
item.key: system.run[test `cat /etc/zabbix/oracle/DATAFILES_f3ipro.txt 2> /dev/null | grep F3I_LOG | sed '1!d' | wc -l` -eq 1 && cat /etc/zabbix/oracle/DATAFILES_f3ipro.txt | grep F3I_LOG | sed '1!d' | awk -F ';' {'print $3'} || echo 0 ]

item.name: Tamanho Livre Datafiles - F3I_LOG 1
item.key: system.run[test `cat /etc/zabbix/oracle/DATAFILES_f3ipro.txt 2> /dev/null | grep F3I_LOG | sed '1!d' | wc -l` -eq 1 && cat /etc/zabbix/oracle/DATAFILES_f3ipro.txt | grep F3I_LOG | sed '1!d' | awk -F ';' {'print $4'} || echo 0]

item.name: Percentual Ocupado DATAFILES - F3I_LOG 1
item.key: system.run[test `cat /etc/zabbix/oracle/DATAFILES_f3ipro.txt 2> /dev/null | grep F3I_LOG | sed '1!d' | wc -l` -eq 1 && cat /etc/zabbix/oracle/DATAFILES_f3ipro.txt | grep F3I_LOG | sed '1!d' | awk -F ';' {'print $5'} || echo 0]

item.name: Tamanho Total DATAFILE- F3I_INDEX 1
item.key: system.run[test `cat /etc/zabbix/oracle/DATAFILES_f3ipro.txt 2> /dev/null | grep INDEX | awk -F ';' {'print $2'} | sed '1!d' | wc -w` -eq 1 && cat /etc/zabbix/oracle/DATAFILES_f3ipro.txt | grep INDEX | awk -F ';' {'print $2'} | sed '1!d' || echo 0]

item.name: Tamanho Usado DATAFILE - F3I_INDEX 1
item.key: system.run[test `cat /etc/zabbix/oracle/DATAFILES_f3ipro.txt 2>/dev/null | grep INDEX | awk -F ';' {'print $3'} | sed '1!d' | wc -w` -eq 1 && cat /etc/zabbix/oracle/DATAFILES_f3ipro.txt | grep INDEX | awk -F ';' {'print $3'} | sed '1!d' || echo 0]

item.name: Tamanho Livre DATAFILE - F3I_INDEX 1
item.key: system.run[test `cat /etc/zabbix/oracle/DATAFILES_f3ipro.txt | grep F3I_INDEX | awk -F ';' {'print $4'} | sed '1!d' | wc -l` -eq 1 && cat /etc/zabbix/oracle/DATAFILES_f3ipro.txt | grep F3I_INDEX | awk -F ';' {'print $4'} | sed '1!d' || echo 0]

item.name: Tamanho Total TEMP 1
item.key: system.run[ test `cat /etc/zabbix/oracle/TEMP_f3ipro.txt | sed '1!d' | awk -F ';' {'print $1'} | wc -w` -eq 1 && cat /etc/zabbix/oracle/TEMP_f3ipro.txt | awk -F ';' {'print $1'} | sed '1!d' || echo 0 ]

item.name: Tamanho Livre TEMP 1
item.key: system.run[test `cat /etc/zabbix/oracle/TEMP_f3ipro.txt | sed '1!d' | awk -F ';' {'print $3'} | wc -w` -eq 1 && cat /etc/zabbix/oracle/TEMP_f3ipro.txt | awk -F ';' {'print $3'} | sed '1!d' || echo 0]

item.name: Percentual Ocupado TEMP 1
item.key: system.run[test `cat /etc/zabbix/oracle/TEMP_f3ipro.txt | sed '1!d' | awk -F ';' {'print $4'} | wc -w` -eq 1 && cat /etc/zabbix/oracle/TEMP_f3ipro.txt | awk -F ';' {'print $4'} | sed '1!d' || echo 0 ]

item.name: Tamanho Usado TEMP 1
item.key: system.run[test `cat /etc/zabbix/oracle/TEMP_f3ipro.txt | sed '1!d' | awk -F ';' {'print $4'} | wc -w` -eq 1 && cat /etc/zabbix/oracle/TEMP_f3ipro.txt | awk -F ';' {'print $4'} | sed '1!d' || echo 0]

item.name: Tamanho Total UNDO 1
item.key: system.run[test `cat /etc/zabbix/oracle/UNDO_f3ipro.txt 2> /dev/null | sed '1!d' | wc -l` -eq 1 || echo 0 && cat /etc/zabbix/oracle/UNDO_f3ipro.txt | sed '1!d' | awk -F ';' {'print $2'}]

item.name: Tamanho Usado UNDO 1
item.key: system.run[test `cat /etc/zabbix/oracle/UNDO_f3ipro.txt 2> /dev/null | sed '1!d' | wc -l` -eq 1 || echo 0 && cat /etc/zabbix/oracle/UNDO_f3ipro.txt | sed '1!d' | awk -F ';' {'print $3'}]

item.name: Percentual Ocupado UNDO 1
item.key: system.run[ test `cat /etc/zabbix/oracle/UNDO_f3ipro.txt 2> /dev/null | sed '1!d' | wc -l` -eq 1 || echo 0 && cat /etc/zabbix/oracle/UNDO_f3ipro.txt | sed '1!d' | awk -F ';' {'print $4'} ]

item.name: Log Backup Linux
item.key: system.run[test `cat /oracle/disco1/backup/logs/backup-linux-nfs_$(date +%Y%m%d)* 2> /dev/null | wc -l` -gt 1 && cat /oracle/disco1/backup/logs/backup-linux-nfs_$(date +%Y%m%d)* || echo Arquivo nao Gerado]
